game.name: The Mystical Traveler
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Custom Volume Controls, Keyboard Only Option, Mouse Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: The Mystical Traveler에서 당신은 2D 픽셀 아트 플랫폼 게임에서 우주 큐브를 조종합니다. 중력을 마스터하고, 행성을 탐험하며, 캐릭터를 잠금 해제하고, 신비로운 우주에서 다양한 도전을 극복하세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: In The Mystical Traveler, you play as a cosmic cube in a 2D pixel art platformer. Master gravity, explore planets, unlock characters, and overcome various challenges in a mysterious universe.
